metadata.name: outcry
metadata.description: OUTCRY — Live Auction Protocol on Solana

instructions.name: claim_refund_for
docs: Permissionless refund — anyone (typically the seller) can trigger a
refund that sends SOL back to the bidder. Bidder is validated via PDA seeds.

accounts.name: payer
docs: Anyone can pay the transaction fee (typically the seller).

accounts.name: bidder
docs: implicitly via the BidderDeposit PDA seed derivation below.

instructions.name: close_auction
docs: Closes AuctionState, AuctionVault, and escrow ATA after all refunds are claimed.
Returns rent-exempt lamports to the seller.

instructions.name: create_session
docs: Creates a session token linking an ephemeral browser keypair to the
real wallet. One popup to authorize, then all bids are instant.

accounts.name: bidder
docs: The real wallet authorizing this session.

accounts.name: auction_state
docs: The auction this session is scoped to. Uses UncheckedAccount because the
auction may be delegated to ER (owner changes to delegation program).
Security: the session_token PDA is seeded with this key, so a fake
address just creates a useless session that won't match any real auction.

accounts.name: session_token
docs: Session token PDA linking ephemeral key → real wallet for this auction.
init_if_needed: safe because PDA is unique per (bidder, auction), only
the bidder can create it, and reinit just updates session_signer (needed
after page refresh when a new ephemeral key is generated).

instructions.name: delegate_auction
docs: Delegates AuctionState to the Ephemeral Rollup. Call on L1 after start_auction.

accounts.name: auction_state
docs: The auction this deposit is for. We accept any account here because when
the AuctionState is delegated to ER, its L1 owner changes to the
delegation program and Anchor's Account<> deserialization would fail.
Security: the auction_vault PDA is derived from this key — if a fake
address is passed, the vault constraint fails.

instructions.name: emergency_refund
docs: Emergency refund for deposits stuck in a delegated (ER-stuck) auction.
Uses UncheckedAccount for auction_state since the owner is the delegation
program, not our program. Only works when auction IS delegated.

accounts.name: auction_state
docs: The auction state account — may be owned by the delegation program
when stuck. We use UncheckedAccount and verify manually.
We also verify it is NOT owned by our program (emergency condition).

instructions.name: end_auction
docs: Sets auction to Ended. Call on ER when delegated, or L1 if not.

accounts.name: authority
docs: Anyone can crank this — permissionless

instructions.name: force_close_auction
docs: Force-closes an auction after the 7-day grace period.
Drains any unclaimed deposits from the vault to the seller and closes
all accounts. Use when bidders haven't claimed refunds and the seller's
accounts are stuck.

instructions.name: forfeit_auction
docs: Handles a defaulted auction where the winner's deposit is insufficient.
Returns NFT to seller, forfeits winner's deposit as penalty, sets Settled
so other bidders can claim refunds.

accounts.name: payer
docs: Anyone can crank this — permissionless

accounts.name: winner_deposit
docs: PDA derivation validated via seeds. Deserialized manually in handler.

instructions.name: place_bid
docs: Places a bid. Call on ER (sub-50ms) when delegated, or L1 if not.

instructions.name: place_bid_session
docs: Places a bid using a session key (ephemeral signer). No wallet popup.
The session token resolves the real wallet for settlement + anti-shill.

accounts.name: session_signer
docs: The ephemeral browser keypair — signs tx without wallet popup.

accounts.name: session_token
docs: Session token proving the ephemeral key is authorized by a real wallet.
Lives on L1 (never delegated). ER clones it as read-only.

accounts.name: payer
docs: Anyone can crank settlement — permissionless

accounts.name: winner_deposit
docs: Winner's deposit PDA — validates they deposited enough

accounts.name: nft_metadata
docs: Parsed for seller_fee_basis_points and creators to enforce royalty distribution.

instructions.name: start_auction
docs: Sets auction to Active with start/end times. Call on L1.

instructions.name: undelegate_auction
docs: Commits state and undelegates AuctionState back to L1. Call on ER after end_auction.

errors.name: BidTooLow
errors.msg: Bid must exceed current bid plus minimum increment

errors.name: AuctionNotStarted
errors.msg: Auction has not started yet

errors.name: AuctionEnded
errors.msg: Auction has already ended

errors.name: InvalidAuctionStatus
errors.msg: Auction is not in the correct status for this operation

errors.name: UnauthorizedSeller
errors.msg: Only the seller can perform this action

errors.name: BelowReserve
errors.msg: Bid does not meet reserve price

errors.name: InsufficientDeposit
errors.msg: Winner deposit insufficient for winning bid

errors.name: AuctionStillActive
errors.msg: Auction still has time remaining

errors.name: CannotCancelWithBids
errors.msg: Cannot cancel auction with existing bids

errors.name: NothingToRefund
errors.msg: Nothing to refund

errors.name: RefundNotAvailable
errors.msg: Refund only available after settlement or cancellation

errors.name: InvalidDuration
errors.msg: Auction duration is out of valid range

errors.name: InvalidReservePrice
errors.msg: Reserve price must be greater than zero

errors.name: InvalidDepositAmount
errors.msg: Deposit amount must be greater than zero

errors.name: ArithmeticOverflow
errors.msg: Arithmetic overflow

errors.name: SellerCannotBid
errors.msg: Seller cannot bid on their own auction

errors.name: OutstandingDeposits
errors.msg: Cannot close auction with outstanding deposits — all bidders must claim refunds first

errors.name: EscrowNotEmpty
errors.msg: Cannot close auction while escrow still holds tokens

errors.name: InvalidNftMint
errors.msg: NFT mint must have 0 decimals

errors.name: InvalidMetadata
errors.msg: Could not parse Metaplex metadata account

errors.name: MissingCreatorAccount
errors.msg: Missing creator account in remaining_accounts for royalty distribution

errors.name: ForfeitNotNeeded
errors.msg: Forfeit not needed — winner has sufficient deposit for the winning bid

errors.name: InvalidTreasury
errors.msg: Invalid protocol treasury account

errors.name: NoBidsToSettle
errors.msg: Auction has no bids to settle

errors.name: InvalidBidIncrement
errors.msg: Minimum bid increment must be greater than zero

errors.name: InvalidDepositAccount
errors.msg: Could not deserialize deposit account data

errors.name: InsufficientVaultBalance
errors.msg: Vault has insufficient lamports for this operation

errors.name: GracePeriodNotElapsed
errors.msg: Grace period has not elapsed — bidders still have time to claim refunds

errors.name: SessionSignerMismatch
errors.msg: Session signer does not match the session token

errors.name: SessionBidderMismatch
errors.msg: Session token bidder does not match expected bidder

fields.name: seller
docs: The seller / artist who created this auction

fields.name: nft_mint
docs: The NFT mint being auctioned

fields.name: reserve_price
docs: Minimum acceptable first bid (lamports)

fields.name: duration_seconds
docs: Auction duration in seconds (set at creation, used by start_auction)

fields.name: current_bid
docs: Current highest bid amount (lamports), 0 if no bids

fields.name: highest_bidder
docs: Current highest bidder, Pubkey::default() if no bids

fields.name: start_time
docs: Unix timestamp when auction went Active (0 if not started)

fields.name: end_time
docs: Unix timestamp when auction ends (extended on anti-snipe)

fields.name: extension_seconds
docs: Seconds to extend when anti-snipe triggers

fields.name: extension_window
docs: Window before end_time that triggers anti-snipe extension

fields.name: min_bid_increment
docs: Minimum increment over current_bid for a new bid

fields.name: status
docs: Auction lifecycle status

fields.name: bid_count
docs: Total number of bids placed

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed

fields.name: auction
docs: The parent auction this vault belongs to

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed

types.name: BidderDeposit
docs: Per-bidder deposit tracking — lives on L1, never delegated.
Seeds: [b"deposit", auction_state.key(), bidder.key()]

fields.name: auction
docs: The auction this deposit is for

fields.name: bidder
docs: The bidder who deposited

fields.name: amount
docs: Total deposited amount (lamports)

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed

types.name: SessionToken
docs: Session key token — links an ephemeral browser keypair to a real wallet.
Seeds: [b"session", auction_state.key(), bidder.key()]

fields.name: auction
docs: The auction this session is scoped to

fields.name: bidder
docs: The REAL wallet (used for settlement, deposit matching, anti-shill)

fields.name: session_signer
docs: The ephemeral browser keypair that can sign bids without wallet popups

fields.name: created_at
docs: When this session was created (informational)

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed
